vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ματταθίας, -ου, ὁ
Mattathias (cf. Μαθθίας): Luk.3:25-26.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.25;
son of: Amos (G0301);
father of: Joseph (G2501J)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Matatías: (1) hijo de Amós (LUK.3:25) ; (2) hijo de Semeí (LUC.3:26)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪他提亞 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華的禮物"
1) 基督的家譜中, 亞摩斯的兒子 (路 3:25)
2) 瑪他提亞是基督家譜中, 西美的兒子 (路 3:26)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
玛他提亚这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是"耶和华的礼物"
1) 基督的家谱中, 亚摩斯的儿子(路3:25)
2) 玛他提亚是基督家谱中, 西美的儿子(路3:26)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.26;
son of: Semein (G4584);
father of: Maath (G3092)
